DOC.brief_summary: The general aim trial determine safety , tolerability pharmacologic profile single escalate dos AbGn-168 administer subcutaneously intravenously patient chronic plaque psoriasis
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Single Doses AbGn-168 Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients chronic plaque psoriasis cover least 3 % body surface area . Female subject must postmenopausal surgically sterilize . Exclusion criterion : Recent use biologic agent , oral psoriasis medication phototherapy
